Arduino Uno R3

partno: BOA001

The Arduino Uno R3 is an extremely well-supported microcontroller, and a fantastic choice for small robotics project.

Out of Stock! Sorry!

$24.99


PRODUCT INFO

The Arduino Uno is extremely useful, easy to program, and upgradeable (in that you can easily add new shields). It's a great 'first microcontroller' for young engineers, because it is so easy to use -- but also it is great for more advanced users who can benefit from the enormous amount of 3rd party open software available for the Arduino family.

FEATURES

  • Equipped with ATmega328
  • 16 digital pins, 6 analog pins
  • 16 MHz Crystal Oscillator
  • USB Connection
  • Power Jack
  • ICSP Header
  • Reset Button

INCLUDES

  • 1 Arduino Uno R3 (Official)

TECH SPECS

MicrocontrollerATmega328
Operating Voltage5V
Input Voltage (recommended)7-12V
Input Voltage (limit)6-20V
Digital I/O Pins14
PWM Digital I/O Pins6
Analog Input Pins6
DC Current per I/O Pin40 mA
DC Current for 3.3V Pin50 mA
Flash Memory32 KB
Flash Memory for Bootloader0.5 KB
SRAM2 KB
EEPROM1 KB
Clock Speed16 MHz
Length68.6 mm
Width53.4 mm
Weight25 g
